reference: Volume Three, Issue Thirty-one, Phile #1 of 9
title: Introduction to Phrack 31
historical_context: This article marks the revival of Phrack after a hiatus, emphasizing its importance in hacker culture.
target_audience: Hackers, phreakers, and those interested in hacker culture history.
short_summary: This introductory piece reaffirms Phrack's commitment to the hacker community, outlining its goals and the significance of its publication.
summary: The article serves as a rallying call for the hacker community, reinforcing the idea that Phrack will continue to be a platform for sharing knowledge and experiences. DH expresses gratitude to contributors and encourages readers to engage with the zine, whether through submissions or discussions. This piece not only marks a new beginning for Phrack but also highlights the enduring nature of hacker culture, which thrives on collaboration, education, and the free exchange of ideas. The message is clear: Phrack is alive and will continue to be a beacon for hackers everywhere.
